entries.meaning: The act of forming into a class or classes; a distribution into groups, as classes, orders, families, etc., according to some common relations or attributes.
examples: I’m using mathesis — a universal science of measurement and order …And there is also taxinomia a principle of 'classification' and ordered tabulation.Knowledge replaced universal resemblance with finite differences. History was arrested and turned into tables …Western reason had entered the age of judgement.
